title: Oatcake, potato and dill samosas
description: I have made it my life’s mission to discover how many ways I can make a samosa, what I can fill it with and what I can wrap it in. The inspiration for these samosa cases is delicious Derbyshire oatcakes. Not the crisp kind you’ll know from the cheeseboard, but more like a soft round savoury pancake.
ingredients: 6 Derbyshire oatcakes or 20cm/8in pancakes, cut in half
